title: 1.) Top 40 Countdown - I'm Having Friend Trouble
description:
12-year-old Nina has a friend who teases her about being flat-chested. - Dr. Laura: "Don't go to war with a mean girl. Just slowly back away."

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
